snippet.title: The Donnerwald Experiment - Chapter 1 Trailer
snippet.description:
The Donnerwald Experiment enters the first round, going Early Access this halloween.
If you buy the game now, you will get the remaining updates for free once they are released.

Our website: 
https://www.wegenbartho-games.com/

Get the game on steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/705770/The_Donnerwald_Experiment/
